channel.title: Roosevelt Island on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Roosevelt Island on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Zhongzhong Noodles
item.description: We planned to meet my partner’s friend on the wonderful Roosevelt Island. For those that haven’t been to Roosevelt Island, there are literally 3 different ways to get there: the F train, the tram (cable car), or transportation via bridge from the Astoria side. With the hopefully slim possibility of living there, my partner wanted to meet their friend and also check out local food delights. Zhongzhong Noodles had been on my list for quite a while, so I figured now is a good time to try it out.
